# Google Font to SVG Path Converter

> One-stop solution for converting Google Fonts to high-quality SVG vector paths, supporting multiple font variants, export formats, perfect for web design, logos, and laser cutting.

## Core Features
- [Google Font to SVG Path](https://text-to-svg.tool.tokyo/)：Convert Google Fonts to SVG vector paths in real-time
- [Logo Font Collection](https://text-to-svg.tool.tokyo/)：Curated Google Fonts perfect for logo design
- [Text Font Collection](https://text-to-svg.tool.tokyo/)：Recommended fonts for web and print
- [Sanskrit Tattoo Design](https://text-to-svg.tool.tokyo/sanskrit-tattoo)：Specialized tools for creating Sanskrit tattoo designs
- [Animation Support](https://text-to-svg.tool.tokyo/)：Create animated SVG text with advanced effects

## Professional Applications
- [Web Design](https://text-to-svg.tool.tokyo/)：Create responsive SVG text for modern websites
- [Logo Design](https://text-to-svg.tool.tokyo/)：Generate scalable vector logos with custom fonts
- [Laser Cutting](https://text-to-svg.tool.tokyo/)：Export DXF files for CNC and laser cutting machines
- [Tattoo Design](https://text-to-svg.tool.tokyo/sanskrit-tattoo)：Create precise vector designs for tattoo artists
- [Print Design](https://text-to-svg.tool.tokyo/)：Generate high-quality vector text for print materials
- [Sign Making](https://text-to-svg.tool.tokyo/)：Create custom text for signs and displays
- [Embroidery](https://text-to-svg.tool.tokyo/)：Convert text to embroidery machine compatible formats
- [3D Printing](https://text-to-svg.tool.tokyo/)：Generate 3D printable text designs

## Export Options
- [SVG Code Export](https://text-to-svg.tool.tokyo/)：One-click copy SVG/TSX code
- [DXF File Download](https://text-to-svg.tool.tokyo/)：Export DXF for laser cutting and CNC
- [TSX Component](https://text-to-svg.tool.tokyo/)：Generate React components with TypeScript
- [PNG Preview](https://text-to-svg.tool.tokyo/)：Export raster preview images
- [External Tools](https://nexus.skin/)：AI Navigation Hub

## Advanced Features
- [Font Customization](https://text-to-svg.tool.tokyo/)：Adjust size, weight, and style
- [Path Editing](https://text-to-svg.tool.tokyo/)：Modify vector paths directly
- [Animation Controls](https://text-to-svg.tool.tokyo/)：Create and customize text animations
- [Batch Processing](https://text-to-svg.tool.tokyo/)：Convert multiple texts at once
- [Font Preview](https://text-to-svg.tool.tokyo/)：Real-time preview of font changes

- [DXF Download Optimization](https://text-to-svg.tool.tokyo/)：Updated April 2024
- [Batch Processing](https://text-to-svg.tool.tokyo/)：New feature for multiple conversions
- [Font Preview Enhancement](https://text-to-svg.tool.tokyo/)：Improved real-time preview
